evidence.text: QADERI: The boss doesn't like you. He was against your transfer here right from the beginning. He wanted to bring his person. I insisted. And now he’s waiting for the tiniest mistake on your part.

QADERI: Now, the prison sentence aside, the main issue is your professional credibility. It hasn’t even been two weeks since you came here. It’s a disgrace! All the gossip! They’ll say he couldn’t manage to keep a gun for two weeks.
QADERI: Your competence will be questioned. They’ll become skeptical about you and get in the way of your promotion.
QADERI: Your mistake was telling your wife and children what your job is.
